text:
<二人共また騒ぎ?
全くいつもそんなこと
ばかり…>
style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 45.05%;top: 0.46%;width: 19.36%;height: 1.94%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 40%;

font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 48.14%;top: 2.94%;width: 14.04%;height: 0.96%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 40%;

font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 48.78%;top: 4.19%;width: 16.81%;height: 0.96%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 40%;

text:
<彼女が
人形を落として
返そうと
したの!>
style: font-size: 16px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 5.37%;top: 6.59%;width: 19.57%;height: 2.57%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 40%;

text:
<でも彼女は
化物髪で
攻撃してきたの!>
style: font-size: 16px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 5.32%;top: 9.76%;width: 22.45%;height: 2.75%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 40%;

text:
<私達が
盗んだと
思ったのね!>
style: font-size: 16px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 76.81%;top: 6.32%;width: 20.74%;height: 3.25%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 50%;

font-size: 16px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 79.89%;top: 10.28%;width: 12.77%;height: 2.27%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 50%;

text:
<面倒を起こして
ごめんなさい!>
style: font-size: 16px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 33.51%;top: 15.35%;width: 25.85%;height: 1.46%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 50%;font-weight: bold;

font-size: 16px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 82.55%;top: 21.71%;width: 15.53%;height: 1.19%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 50%;

font-size: 16px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 29.04%;top: 34.93%;width: 12.87%;height: 1.59%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 50%;

font-size: 16px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 76.06%;top: 34.95%;width: 19.79%;height: 1.81%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 50%;

font-size: 16px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 24.47%;top: 52.28%;width: 9.04%;height: 1.06%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 50%;

text:
君の名前って
もしかして
アーマ?
style: font-size: 16px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 72.23%;top: 51.26%;width: 19.89%;height: 2.36%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 50%;

font-size: 16px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 47.02%;top: 54.39%;width: 17.98%;height: 1.59%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 50%;

font-size: 16px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 30.11%;top: 66.69%;width: 8.83%;height: 1.58%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 50%;

font-size: 16px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 65.96%;top: 64.34%;width: 11.91%;height: 1.33%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 50%;

text:
なんで今
英語で喋るの?
style: font-size: 16px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 78.62%;top: 65.11%;width: 18.83%;height: 1.29%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 50%;

font-size: 16px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 17.45%;top: 70.62%;width: 17.02%;height: 1.50%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 50%;

text:
君の母親と
髪も服装も
瓜二つね…
style: font-size: 16px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 27.34%;top: 78.77%;width: 15.21%;height: 2.54%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 50%;

font-size: 16px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 67.55%;top: 70.59%;width: 27.45%;height: 1.31%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 50%;

font-size: 16px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 89.57%;top: 72.83%;width: 7.77%;height: 1.52%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 50%;

font-size: 16px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 85.11%;top: 74.37%;width: 10.74%;height: 1.83%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 50%;

text:
そうね!
変なこと聞いて
ゴメンね!
style: font-size: 16px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 8.94%;top: 81.79%;width: 20.43%;height: 1.65%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 50%;

text: 私の名前はヨリ・ユウレイモト君の叔母よ
style: font-size: 16px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 56.91%;top: 88.59%;width: 19.04%;height: 2.23%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 50%;
